name: Plenty Of Fish Purple Forums
description:
I got tired of the ugly ass default colors on Plenty Of Fish.

Still a work in progress to some degree.

I also use style 4990 by user 4976 to get rid of the ads

I did a pink breast cancer awareness version too. style 24672

   2009-12-22
   - added input, textarea
   - buttons glow, input area is purple, yellow text
   - darkened colors
   2009-12-25 
   - "raised" the textsmall so it's easier to read.
   2010-01-26
   - made small links inline boxes so they're easier to click
   - added color to small links
   2010-01-27
   - fixed the link bar
